title: Elegant Relais & Châteaux Thanjavur Stay with Daily Breakfast & One Child Stays Free
description:
Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of Thanjavur's culture and heritage at the breathtakingly restored Svatma Thanjavur, where a beautiful amalgamation of traditional living, luxurious comfort and pure vegetarian dining awaits. Located in one of the region's most historically important towns, Thanjavur, this boutique mansion is steeped in 150 years of heritage and takes you back to an era of opulent architecture and fine arts. The epitome of Tamil traditions, this elegant property's 38 rooms are unique and each is imbued with Relais & Châteaux sophistication.

Within just six hours of Chennai and 7.5 hours from Bengaluru, you can reach Svatma Thanjavur, the only luxury boutique hotel in Thanjavur, and your gateway to the region's iconic temples, including the 10-acre Royal Palace Complex (Maratha Palace).

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start every day with a buffet breakfast at Aaharam restaurant
- Enjoy one three-course dinner for two, once per stay, at Aaharam restaurant
- Unwind with one cocktail or one glass of wine per adult, once per stay
- Make the most of your stay with a 20% discount on drinks, dining and spa treatments
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** One child (five and under) stays free in existing bedding with all package inclusions (except alcohol).

**Longer stay bonus:** Stay 4+ nights and enjoy one Thali lunch for two, once per stay, a second cocktail or glass of wine per adult, per stay, and an indulgent 15-minute foot massage for two once per stay.
offer_address: No. 4/1116, Blake Hr Sec School Road, Maharnonbu Chavadi, Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu 613001
